resources.string: Press the Callout button to reach out to your selected contacts
[DEBUG] This is a test of the Callout system on the users phone, if you have received this, please ignore.
Callout requires usage of your contacts. This is to ensure the availability of those to contact. Please accept the permission otherwise Callout will not work as intended.
Callout requires usage of SMS. This is the main function of Callout to work as an SMS shortcut. Please accept the permission otherwise Callout will not work as intended.
